0.plot: Teaser Trailer for LOSTRIESLAND LOSTFRIESLAND is an International Transmedia Mystery Series dedicated to the mobile generation. Taking place in both Germany and the US, it focuses on East Frisia, a coastal region in the northwest of Germany. Exploring this mystic land full of dark legends, LOSTFRIESLAND will immerse the viewer in a mystery enshrouded by a fog of time.

Taking place in both Germany and the US, it focuses on East Frisia, a coastal region in the northwest of Germany. Exploring this mystic land full of dark legends, LOSTFRIESLAND will immerse the viewer in a mystery enshrouded by a fog of time.
imdb.title: Lostfriesland
plot: LOSTFRIESLAND is an International Transmedia Mystery Series dedicated to the mobile generation. Taking place in both Germany and the US, it focuses on East Frisia, a coastal region in the northwest of Germany. Exploring this mystic land full of dark legends, LOSTFRIESLAND will immerse the viewer in a mystery enshrouded by a fog of time.::Sdun.net

Lured to the mystic land of East Frisia on the northwest coast of Germany in order to discover more about the origins of their ancestors, a group of young Americans disappears without trace. The bizarre reappearance of one of the group seven years later unleashes a series of even stranger events that are linked to a mystery that is enshrouded by a fog of time.
